summary:
Fire gives you Vigor.
Player's auto health regen become very very slower than vanilla.(except vampires and those under the sign of The Lady and Blessed one by Namira.)
Player will be healed by near the fire.(except vampire)
descriptionHtml:
2013 3/7 updated. now version 1.1 (Blessing of Namira was now supported. Please forgive me! Namira!)

Fire gives you Vigor.
Player's auto health regen become very very slower than vanilla.(except vampire and those under the sign of The Lady and Blessed one by Namira.)
Player will be healed by near the fire.(except vampire)

-How to get Heal
Get warm by the fire. (except critical fire)
Eat Foods.
Use Potions.
Have a sleep.
Cast a spell.
Activate Lady Stone.
Become a Vampire.
Receive the blessing of Namira.

-Known Compatible
Camping Lite made by McGuffin
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11526

Frostfall -Hypothermia Camping Survival- made by Chesko
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163

-How to uninstall (if you saved with this mod)
1. Deactivate this mod.
2. Load.
3. Open the console.
4. *Type "bat FoVcleaner" and Enter. (Except "")
5. Save.

*This value is vanilla value(Health Regen 0.7)
So, if use mod that tweak Health Regen, please tweak "FoVcleaner.txt".

Special thanks for r_basilico, ElminsterEU and his team, and support thread.
author: alalagi
